page.title: 16CLOTHES:FRANCISCAN NUNS CONT
page.content: other clothes like dungarees, but still with a red cross on. The Sisters have a habit for Sundays and two others for rest of the time. Around their waist is a white cord which traditionally comes from people who worked in fields,(peasants>to hold up their tunics.The cord has three knots for the three main vows of Poverty,Chastity and Obedience.These are the vows that the nuns cannot break and is also a symbol of how they still live today. The sisters also wear wedding rings (gold bands)on third finger left hand like we do when we marry.For the sisters it is a symbol of being married to God, for life.The sisters also wear rosary beads around their waists.Each bead represents a prayer. The scapula is given to the nuns when they make their first vows and blessed
